ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (/系统安全验证/.test(src)) {
    let url = source.key;
    let psid = cookie.getCookie(url);
    //java.log(psid);
    let searchkey = java.get("key");
    let code = java.getVerificationCode("https://www.d5uu.com/include/vdimgck.php");
    let so = java.post(`${url}/search.php?scheckAC=check&page&searchtype&order&tid&area&year&letter&yuyan&state&money&ver&jq`, `validate=${code}&searchword=${searchkey}`, {
        "Cookie": psid
    });
    //java.log(cookie.getCookie(url));
    cookie.setCookie(url, psid);
    result = so.body();
    //java.log(result);
}
result;
</js>
.stui-vodlist__media@li
